Desc.entry: A Victorian country house set in five acres of grounds and gardens. 3 group rooms, including dining room, good-sized kitchen, 10 bedrooms sleeping up to 36 people, a large barn, camping field, lawn and gardens. The space can be hired non-residentially but at weekends the house is reserved for residential groups. Please see website for further details.

DisabledAccess.entry: Full barn access. Partial wheelchair access to main house.
